name: Go To Searchpage And Search on "Biljett", Verify Result And Pagination
fullName: Test Cases.Search.Go To Searchpage And Search on "Biljett", Verify Result And Pagination
description:
This test checks:
1. Navigates to search page
2. Performs search
3. Verifies result
4. Verifies pagination
5. Goes back and verifies result again
descriptionHtml:
This test checks:

  1. Navigates to search page
  2. Performs search
  3. Verifies result
  4. Verifies pagination
  5. Goes back and verifies result again

testStage.description:
This test checks:
1. Navigates to search page
2. Performs search
3. Verifies result
4. Verifies pagination
5. Goes back and verifies result again

parameters.name: arg2
parameters.value: Save Screenshot With Timestamp and TC Name
